document.text:
From: 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: [EXTERNAL] U.S. v. Maxwell, S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) - Letter re Proposed Limiting 
Instructions 
Date: Mon, 22 Nov 2021 05:41:44 +0000 
Attachments: 2021.11.22_Letter to_Judge_Nathan_re_Limiting_Instructions.PDF 
Inline-Images: image001.gif; image002.gif 
Dear Chambers — 
With apologies for the delay, attached please find the defendant's letter regarding the proposed limiting instructions in 
the Court's Opinion and Order, dated November 19, 2021. The defense submits this letter temporarily under seal. 
Regards, 
COHEN & GRESSER LLP 
view bio 
WWW.COlle Jal

the individual named above. If the reader of this e-mail is not the intended recipient or a representative of the intended recipient. you are hereby notified that any 
review. dissemination or copying of this e-mail or the infommtion contained herein is prohibited. If you have received this e-mail in error. please immediately notify 
the sender by telephone and 
permanently 
delete this e-mail. Thank 
you.
